pr_title: Convert katas to use with syntax rather than explicit run call.

timeline.message: Convert katas to use with syntax rather than explicit run call.

timeline.bodyText: This class could be created outside the scope of with. It is generic code that does not depend on a specific pipeline.
timeline.author: iht
timeline.diffHunk:

-        if element % 2 == 1:
-            yield element

timeline.message: Move class definition outside of with statement.
